"About Excubes":
"This will explain the Excube System.

\"Excubes\" are items that allow you to trade for specialty items and weapons.

You can obtain them via:

\u3000\u3000- A random drop in an Emergency Quest or Limited Quest.
\u3000\u3000- Recycling a Class Excube after gaining 1 level's worth of EXP over the level cap.
\u3000\u3000- A Client Order reward or prize
\u3000\u3000- Recycling certain weapons and items.
\u3000\u3000- Title reward from the Title Counter.
\u3000\u3000- Using Meseta to purchase one from the Treasure Shop's Meseta Shop.

â€»Purchasing an Excube (or two) from the Treasure Shop is not recommended."

"There are two types of Excubes, the normal Excube and Class Excubes.

\u3000\u3000- Class Excubes can be obtained when you have reached the current maximum level cap and have gained a level afterwards.

\u3000\u3000- Normal Excubes can be obtained by defeating enemies, completing certain quests, a certain title reward, or by completing certain Client Order rewards.

If the player cannot hold these Excubes at the time, they will be sent to Storage or Temporary Storage."

"Once you have saved up a certain number of Excubes, you can trade them for specialty items at the \"Excube Shop\".

The Excube Shop is on the 2nd level of the Shop Area."
